text: Ugbu a, gaa buso ndị Amalek agha. Gbuchapụ ihe niile15:3 Gbuchapụ ihe niile nke a, nʼokwu ndị Hibru pụtara i were ihe niile, tinyere mmadụ na anụ ụlọ, nyefee Onyenwe anyị kpamkpam na-eleghị anya nʼazụ site ikpochapụ ha. Usoro okwu a dịkwa nʼamaokwu ndị a: 1Sa 15:8,9,15,18,20,21 ha nwere. Enwekwala ọmịiko nʼahụ ha. Gbuo ndị ikom niile, ndị inyom niile, ụmụntakịrị niile na ụmụ na-aṅụ ara, igwe ehi na atụrụ, ịnyịnya kamel na ịnyịnya ibu ha niile.’ ”
